options.label: Any text max 10 chars
options.tooltip: Any text you like (max 15 chars long). Extra chars use those codes ^1  ∞, ^2 ♡, ^3 ™, ^4 ★, ^5 ↑

options.label: or select presets --------->
options.tooltip: You can modify your custom string in brackets - works in game

options.label: Random numeric (1564)
options.tooltip: Text is ignored and random number between 1200-1900 generated instead
